tools.name: merge-pdfs
tools.description: Merge multiple PDF files into a single PDF

input_paths.description: List of input PDF file paths

tools.name: extract-pages
tools.description: Extract specific pages from a PDF file

pages.description: List of page numbers to extract (1-based indexing)

tools.name: search-pdfs
tools.description: Search for PDF files in a directory with optional pattern matching

tools.name: merge-pdfs-ordered
tools.description: Merge PDFs in a specific order based on patterns or exact names

patterns.description: List of patterns or names in desired order

tools.name: find-related-pdfs
tools.description: Find a PDF and then search for related PDFs based on its content, including common substring patterns

target_filename.description: Name of the initial PDF to analyze

pattern_matching_only.description: Only search for repeating substring patterns

min_pattern_occurrences.description: Minimum times a pattern must appear to be considered significant
